item.title: Tech Events API
item.description: This Code for Greenville project queries their own organizations API to compile a list of organizations in the upstate who are hosting events on Meeetup or Event Brite. <–more!–> I discovered the project after graduating from Carolina Code School. I got the chance to meet two organizers at a local gathering in 2020, just before we started to quarantine. This application queries data.openupstate.org/ to create a list of organizations hosting events on Meetup.

item.title: Chef's Notebook
item.description: Chef’s Notebook is a full-stack application built in Django and React.js.
